original_title: Kaushalya Navaratne, the new BASL President
original_body_lines: Senior Attorney Kaushalya Navaratne assumed duties as the 27th President of the Bar Association of Sri Lanka (BASL).
He succeeds former BASL President Attorney-at-Law Saliya Pieris PC whose tenure concluded on Saturday.
Attorney Kaushalya Navaratne was elected the BASL President on January 11.
Navaratne’s induction took place at the 49th Convocation of the BASL, held at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) yesterday afternoon.
Attorney General Sanjaya Rajaratnam was also present at the event.
Speaking at the event, the new BASL President assured that the BASL will continue to function independently.
